text: Nabiyow! ama korosuk ixxic: sin Rabbiy naba, Yallaw axcuk seecaay kallaca, hinnay Arracmaanow axcuk kaa seecaay kallaca, isin tama namma migaaqak kaa elle kallacitinnaan migaaqal kaa kallacita, toysa isin kallactaanam inki Rabbi kinnik toysa Yalli inkih meqe migaaqitte leemih sabbatah, Nabiyow isi salaatal Qhuraan takriye waqdi fayya kaa ma haysin koros koo taabbeeh Qhuraan xaaftaamak, Ramma kaa ma haysin ku kataysis kaa aabbe waytaamak, fayya kaa haytam kee Ramma kaa haytaamak fanaa fanah yan gita wagitak kaa akriy
